data.title: Pandemic brought significant shifts in consumer preferences, says Britannia Industries
data.meta_description: The company is well placed to sustain growth and is confident of addressing the evolving situation with its wide distribution network, intrinsic brand strengths, innovation and technology capabilities and cost efficiency programmes, Britannia Industries said in its latest annual report.
data.text:
The company is well placed to sustain growth and is confident of addressing the evolving situation with its wide distribution network, intrinsic brand strengths, innovation and technology capabilities and cost efficiency programmes, Britannia Industries said in its latest annual report.

PTI

September 07, 2021 / 14:09 IST

PTI
